translations: 规定；[法]条款（stipulation 的复数）；契约

sentences.sentence: The leases come with painstaking stipulations to mitigate any possible environmental harm to species like the polar bear.
sentences.translation: 这些租约附带了细致的条款，以减轻对北极熊等物种的任何可能的环境伤害。

sentences.sentence: Some of the clauses in your L/C No. 5741 are not in agreement with the stipulations of the S/C.
sentences.translation: 你方第5741号信用证中的一些条款与销售合同的规定不符。
诗5中有上帝方面的规定。
